attributes.action: Make all forms of  "Twilight" by  Stephenie Meyer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After reading about Twilight fan attacks and Twilight related suicides, I am starting this petition online to garner attention to said attacks and suicides, and wish to ban these books because of these events.

I, the starter of this petition am not a witness to any of these events and have no proof of them, however, I have links to those who are, and will share those here: http://tinyurl.com/c83yxs .

The link provided is to an account of a fangirl attack in the UK (presumably in high school), this event happened on February 2nd, 2009.

This petition is to get these books banned anywhere possible.
